front.title: Multiple Layer Resource Optimization for Optical as a Service

author.organization: Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications
Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications
Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications
Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications
Beijing University of Posts and Telecommunications

abstract.t: We have established a neural network model optimized by adaptive artificial fish swarm algorithm. Then we propose a novel multi-path pre-reserved resource allocation strategy to increase resource utilization. The results prove the effectiveness of our method.
